lyrics:
5 contributorsmusic for love lyricsright about now

chorus
girl turn me up
and let me come through your speakers
blow the sound out of your tweeters
cause baby girl this is the music for love

shawty dont be scared
just let the bass line hit you
boom boom
all up in your system
cause baby girl this is the music for love

girl let my frequency just flow through your body
get this party started
cause baby baby girl
this is the music for love

put me on repeat girl
lets go again and again
no matter am or fm
cause baby girl this is the music for love

verse 1

whenever nobodys around
cause if the sound
it starts to wake up the neighbors
were gonna have to turn it down down down down
you might also likeim about to have a real eruption
theres gonna be no interruption
baby come push my buttons
ill show you all my functions

after we done hit rewind
and well go back to the top

and the music were making baby
were making for love
